summary: Tel Aviv, Summer 1989. Boaz, a beautiful and alluring linguistics student, receives anonymous, male-written, love letters that undermines his sexual identity and interfere with his peaceful life with his beloved girlfriend.
cast: Yoav Reuveni|Yehuda Nahari Halevi|Yariv Mozer|Moran Rosenblatt|Eran Lev|Hava Ortman|Eyal Cohen|Liron Argaman|Yaron Biton|Shak Brenner|Adi Douiev|Itay Gonen|Aya Hirsch|Yoni Ittiel|Irit Kashani|Eyal Kentov|Guy Lubelchik|Sivan Malka|Orit Nahari|Ron Paran|Lior Soroka|Stav Strashko|Dana Tross|Amir Wolf|Ori Yaniv
title: Shablulim BaGeshem
